page.title: 02Jenny's Day cont.
page.content: Midday we have {diner} in the Hall. Some have sandwiches,others have school dinners.I like fish in batter,apple crumble and custard.At 1:15 we come in for afternon lessons.On Mondays we go to the Baths at Fulwood leisure centre for a {swimming} lesson.We go by a special {bus} with a neighbouring school. When we get back to school at 3:30 it is time to go home.After letting myself in with my own key I get changed and clean out the stables.It is about 5:30 when I come in for my tea.Then I watch {T.V.} till bedtime.I have a wash,clean my teeth and then go to sleep.
